Dessert Menu


Cake Pops Sold by the Dozen

Moist cake bites dipped in chocolate and beautifully decorated in custom shapes, colors, and designs. Choose from fun, detailed creations to clean, elegant styles—whatever fits your vibe.

Custom Designs Many Flavors Simplistic Options Vibrant Colors

Bite Size Cake Pops Sold by the Dozen

Mini cake pop delights dipped in chocolate, served with cute mini forks or themed toothpicks like disco balls, stars, or graduation toppers. Same delicious flavors as our full-size pops.

Party-Perfect Minis Fun Designs

Cakesicles Sold by the Dozen

A cake pop in the shape of a popsicle—cakesicles come in large or small sizes, dipped in chocolate and decorated with endless design options. Perfect for making a statement at any event.

Popsicle-Shaped Cake Pops Large or Mini Sizes Custom Designs

Chocolate covered Pretzel Rods Sold by the Dozen

Thick crunchy pretzel rods dipped in chocolate and decorated with edible accents. A perfect sweet-and-salty combo that looks as good as it tastes.

Sweet & Salty Chocolate Dipped

Chocolate covered Pretzel Twists Sold by the Dozen

Same great chocolate-dipped, decorated treat as our rods—but with that classic twist shape. Adds a little fun to your dessert table.

Twist Shape Chocolate Coated Sweet & Salty

Fruit Tarts (Vanilla & Chocolate) Sold by the Dozen

Mini tart shells filled with silky custard or chocolate ganache and topped with your choice of fresh, flavorful fruit. A bite-sized burst of elegance.

Creamy Filling Options Fresh Fruit Toppings Bite-Size Treats
